unnormalised: Oi, auto enthusiasts! Buckle up 'cause the Indian auto scene is buzzing!
normalised: Hello, auto enthusiasts! Buckle up because the Indian auto scene is buzzing!

unnormalised: First up, Maruti Suzuki just dropped the new 2024 Brezza Facelift. Rumors say it's got a slicker look and even more features than before! Price starts around Rs. 8 Lakhs, making it a real family car contender.
normalised: First up, Maruti Suzuki just dropped the new two thousand and twenty four Brezza Facelift. Rumors say it is got a slicker look and even more features than before! Price starts around rupee eight lakhs, making it a real family car contender.

unnormalised: Then there's Mahindra, teasing us with glimpses of their upcoming Thar 5-door! Expected to launch near Diwali, perfect for those festive off-roading adventures around Rajasthan.
normalised: Then there is Mahindra, teasing us with glimpses of their upcoming Thar five-door! Expected to launch near Diwali, perfect for those festive off-roading adventures around Rajasthan.

unnormalised: Tata Motors isn't slacking either. Word on the street is they're prepping an electric version of the Nexon, aiming for a range of 400 km. Dr. Sharma at IIT Delhi reckons it'll be a game-changer.
normalised: Tata Motors is not slacking either. Word on the street is they are prepping an electric version of the Nexon, aiming for a range of four hundred kilometer. Doctor Sharma at I I T Delhi reckons it will be a game-changer.

unnormalised: And lastly, remember that quirky startup from Bangalore? They're finally launching their electric scooter with a claimed range of 150 km and a surprisingly spacious boot - enough for your dabba and then some! They've even opened a new manufacturing unit spanning 20,000 sq ft. Expect booking details soon! Khushi Ho!
normalised: And lastly, remember that quirky startup from Bangalore? They are finally launching their electric scooter with a claimed range of one hundred and fifty kilometer and a surprisingly spacious boot enough for your dabba and then some! They have even opened a new manufacturing unit spanning twenty thousand square feet. Expect booking details soon! Khushi Ho!
